effect.ruby_sapphire: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.emerald: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.firered_leafgreen: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.colosseum: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.xd: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.emerald: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.colosseum: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.xd: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Creates a mist that stops reduction of abilities.
flavor_text.emerald: Creates a mist that stops reduction of abilities.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The ally party is protected by a mist that prevents stat reductions.
